New Records: Pete Alonso hit his first home run since September 19 during the ninth inning.
Francisco Lindor hit a two-run blast earlier in the series.
Key Match Events: Pete Alonso's three-run home run in the ninth inning was a turning point.
Jose Quintana pitched six shutout innings with four hits and one walk.
Post-Match Reflections: Mets manager Carlos Mendoza highlighted the team's resilience.
Owner Steve Cohen expressed excitement and pride in the team's effort.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was part of the NL Wild Card Series.
Pete Alonso displayed a 'Playoff Pumpkin' during the celebration.
Others: The playoff pumpkin and celebration details were mentioned.
